name: Tank Rage
description:
This is a pet project i am working on while learning Unity Engine. This game is based on old game known as Battle City which was in NES. 

Aim of the game is to destroy enemy tanks and protect our HQ building from getting destroyed. Apart from enemy tanks we have to navigate obstacles like bricks, trees, slippery Ice, Water, exploding Oil tanks(works like chain explosions)  and indestructible obstacles. There are power ups like rate of fire, health, Energy shield, Tank speed etc.

The latest update to the Game is as follows, 

1. Redesigned UI 

2. Switch between top down and isometric camera view using 'c' key 

3. Revamped Power Up system (power ups can stack) 

4. Included 25 levels 

5. Implemented Sound fx and Music fx control 

6. New level selector : start from first level or from any level already unlocked 

7. Detailed game play instructions
